attributes.content: Wh-why are those outsiders sticking their noses in our business?!
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: And you, Severin! Your son died in that fire! How can you still aid those incompetent swine?!
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: ...Put down the blade and tell me who pushed you to do this? Who gave you those weapons?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Final warning.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Gah—!
attributes.name: Rebellious Townsfolk

attributes.content: That’s assault with a deadly weapon. You think you can just go back to your homes? You’ll get a knock on your door soon enough. The Gendarmerie will hold you accountable.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Just 'hold them accountable?'
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I don’t have to explain our accountability processes to a couple of tourists.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Do you have anything at all to tell 'a couple of tourists' then? 'Schultz?'
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I do. You’re strong. Stronger than I’d expect a doctor to be. Impressive.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: And... thank you for the assistance.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Usually, we go by 'Operator.'
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Now can you tell us where Atro is?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: It’s not safe here. Let’s talk somewhere else.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Good work, Miss Folinic.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Sorry I’m not much help in battle...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: It’s fine. You did your best. If I’d known what was happening in Wolumonde, I wouldn’t have brought you along.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Even if we’re just helping resolve some disputes, you’re too young to be dragged into—
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Miss Folinic!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: —*Sigh* ...Fine, fine. Little Lisa’s all grown up now. Did you get hurt?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: No, I’m fine.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: But you were spacing out back there. What’s wrong?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: The quarantine zone is right near here. Everything seems to have gone back to peace and quiet after we drove off the protestors.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Mm... It doesn’t seem that different from any other place.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: You’re right, it’s not that different. They have shops, cafés, ads for music halls and art salons...
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: No one’s getting rounded up by guards and sent out to the tundra to die. They get to live pretty ordinary lives... You might even say they live well.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: The Infected get treated so differently all around the world.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: If every place was so good to the Infected...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: We’d be out of a job.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Wha?! I mean, that’s true, but I’d be really happy about it! E-even though I just became an operator...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I’m kidding... The fact that Infected can roam the streets freely only serves to underscore how special the situation in Wolumonde is.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: ...They’re hiding something from us.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Huh? Where did that come from—
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Shh! Lower your voice! We’ll talk once the officer is gone!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: The Infected rebels are acting really weird. And they keep talking about a 'fire' and a 'doctor,' right?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Add in that officer who definitely knows who we are, and who really doesn’t want to tell me anything about Atro...
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: And I can’t shake the feeling that something rotten is brewing in this town.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Even Leithania wouldn’t go so far as to let the Infected riot in the streets. Where are the guards? Why isn’t anyone stopping them?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Now that you mention it...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I’ve got a bad feeling about this.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: M-maybe everyone’s just a little on edge? Considering what the town’s been through...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: ...I pray that’s all it is.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I’m so sorry to have dragged you into all this just as you’ve arrived. It’s shameful...
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Oh, don’t worry about it.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Are you part of the local Gendarmerie?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Not really. But everyone in Wolumonde undergoes military training. When the time comes, we have a duty to take up arms...
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: But Uncle... Err, Schultz Severin is our town’s highest official.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: The middle-aged smoker who really doesn’t want to do his job? Too bad, but that irresponsible disregard for duty doesn’t exactly come off as mysterious.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: There’s a reason he is the way he is—
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: No... never mind...
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Oh right, how should I call you two?
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Call me Operator Folinic, and this is Operator Suzuran.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Folinic, Suzuran... these are code names?
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Where we come from, most people prefer not to use their real names at work. Just like 'Atro.'
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Dr. Atro...
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Seems you’re acquainted.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Yes... Sorry. I know you have your doubts, but the Schultz will give you the answers you need. It’s not my place to say.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Now, come with me please.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: How much did you tell them?
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: Not much. Not enough to upset anyone.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I... I’ve put forward some unreasonable ideas, but you’re always free to reject them.
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: That’s a creative way to dodge responsibility. But you’ll get no comfort from me.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: If I stood here and told them the whole, unadulterated truth right now, would you be happy? Would that make everyone happy?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I represent the people, but you’re the leader of Wolumonde. What does it matter if we’re happy or not?
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: I don’t want to make things difficult. Especially when I’m hosting guests at the same time the Infected are stirring.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: *Sigh*... Put it away. You want to make a good impression on Rhodes Island. Now’s not the time to be lighting cigarettes or playing with crossbow bolts.
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: I think we’re well past any good impressions...
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: You——Wait, are they the two young girls out there?
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: Young girls? Hah, wait until you see them fight. Then you’ll start wondering if Leithanien schools focus too much on the arts, just like those bureaucrats.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Sirs, they’re here.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Ah, it’s the doctors from Rhodes Island! Welcome to Wolumonde! I am so sorry you had to get roped into our local affairs like that. Let us make it up to you with an evening—
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: Thank you for the offer, but we’re only here to establish Dr. Atro’s whereabouts. We don’t intend to stay long.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: So, where is she?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Erm, well—
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: The local Infected seem to know 'Dr. Atro.' You’re stalling, and I’d prefer you not.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Doctors, I’m very sorry, but things in Wolumonde are very complicated right now. We need some time to give your company a proper explanation, in order to guarantee—
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: She disappeared.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Wha?!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: ...Sir, when it comes to matters such as this, you might want to shed that flippant attitude of yours.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: The truth is flippant. It’s simple. No need to sugar coat it. You’re angry now, but you’re not surprised. You already guessed it, didn’t you?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: We received the Infected doctor who called herself 'Atro.' And we greatly appreciate her help caring for the many Infected residents of Wolumonde during this difficult time.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: And you show your appreciation by telling us 'she disappeared?'
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: No need for hostility here... *Cough*, *hack hack*—
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Sir, you look unwell. You should quit smoking.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: It would probably be a good idea to get a physical examination, as it could be—
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: ...No thanks, but I appreciate the concern.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Back to business, after Wolumonde steered over here to avoid Catastrophe, Dr. Atro set up camp on the edge of town. She was housing some Infected residents.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: But not long ago, there was a fire in her camp.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Er...
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: ...A fire?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I know what you’re thinking. But according to what we currently know, it seemed to be an accident.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Dr. Atro left town after that. And we don’t know where she went.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: How can you act like this is all no big deal?!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Miss Folinic! C-calm down!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: We... We’ll investigate ourselves. But you tell us she just disappeared after a fire like that’s not going to upset us!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: ...I’m very sorry.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: If I’m not going to talk lightly, all I can give you is 'I’m very sorry.'
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Dr. Atro is a good egg. She’s got no Leithanien blood. No connection to us at all, really. And yet she’s nobler than anybody around here.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: And when the Catastrophe struck Wolumonde, she didn’t run away. She offered us help.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I have the utmost respect for the good doctor. I hope nothing happened to her.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: But after the fire, you saw it yourself, some of the Infected folks don’t have the same ideas.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Not that I blame them. The town’s cut off from the outside world. We’re short on supplies. And a gang of armed Infected are out there circling.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Armed Infected?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Outlanders. All of them Infected, all of them armed. Most are Leithanien, but there are a few devils among them.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: The term is 'Sarkaz,' please. I hope the meaning of the word is not lost on you. Do you have any other information about the armed Infected?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: They’re merely vultures waiting to pick our bones. And they’re not the first.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Oh? So why didn't they immediately show up to plunder the town? Why are they just 'loitering' out there?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Just come out with it already.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Wolumonde’s lack of sensitivity toward the Infected is understandable.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: After all, it’s a miracle Leithania was letting infected people live alongside non-infected people for so long—
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: —But it’s also an opportunity for bad actors to take advantage of such leniency.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I told you, Rhodes Island isn’t just a bunch of doctors. We’re also experts at dealing with the Infected.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: There are some areas... where I’d rather trust our own judgment.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: For example... have you ever heard of the 'Reunion Movement?'
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Before the Great Rift, I saw that name in the newspapers from time to time. Mostly reports from Ursus, but occasionally in Leithania.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: But to a small tourist town, it doesn’t mean much. Folks around here would rather listen to the gossip from the next town over than official reports on faraway countries.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: What are you getting at? You think Reunion has something to do with this?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: No, I don’t want to jump to conclusions. Let’s leave it there for now.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Right... *Cough*. Either way, thanks for the info.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Speaking from experience, I don’t think your side of the story will have much influence on our mission.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: That’s too bad. But honestly, I didn’t expect much.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: We may have to do some investigating around town. We need to find out what the deal with this 'disappearance' is...
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Rhodes Island will demand the necessary compensation from the relevant people.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Er...
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: ...Understood.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I’ve no reason to argue with that face of yours.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: You can move about the town freely, as Dr. Atro’s associates. You are honored guests of Wolumonde.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Ah! But of course! Please, make yourselves at home here. Upstairs is the Wolumonde government’s finest parlor.
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: You must be tired from your long journey? Please, take a rest upstairs while we—
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: No need. I have something to attend to.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Can we start our investigation now?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: We’ll prepare the paperwork and notify the residents after the meeting. As you wish.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Suzuran, let’s go.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Oh? Er, okay! See you soon, Wolumonders!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: ...*Sigh*.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: How long can you keep them in the dark?
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: Did you see her expression?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I did.
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: You did. Rhodes Island may not be the type of company to try to extort us, but who knows what they might do to avenge a lost colleague?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: The way I see it, it all ends the same.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: But... but, it wasn’t our fault. Shouldn’t they be after the damned Infected that caused the fire?!
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: We have no proof.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: But we can’t just take the blame either!
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: We tolerated the Infected as much as we could, and how did they repay us? Ever since the Gendarmerie left, they’ve completely been running rampant!
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: ...Indeed. As for the truth, truth is a fickle thing. See this match? Matches are more reliable than the truth.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: The doctor’s right. You really should quit. You’ve got a long life ahead of you.
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: They’re 'operators.' I only listen to 'doctors.'
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Touché...
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: Tatjana, keep an eye on our guests. Make sure they don’t get into trouble.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Ah, yes, sir! Of course!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Her?
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: That one, what was the name... Folinic. Yes.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Do you know what Folinic’s expression of pain and anger reminded me of?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Don’t keep me waiting.
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: Tatjana. It made me think of her. Why didn’t she show me a face like that?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Thor was very nearly her husband. You’d think she’d be a little sad.
attributes.name: Severin
